card_good_to_know_load_account_descripti: PLZ_TRANSLATE Add your contact details in the app to deposit money into your child‚Äôs Gimi account. Worried about missing a pocket money payment? Relax, we will remind you every month to deposit pocket money into the Gimi account, but it is of course up to you when and how much. You can top up the Gimi account when you wish by tapping the pink plus button on your home screen. Note that there is a limit of max 10 transfers per day.
card_good_to_know_pin_description_parren: PLZ_TRANSLATE You cannot choose the PIN code yourself. It is important for your child to memorise their PIN code. You can get a PIN code reminder under settings in the app.
card_good_to_know_load_card_title_parent: PLZ_TRANSLATE How to load the card
card_good_to_know_load_card_description_: PLZ_TRANSLATE The money in your Gimi account can easily be transferred to the card whenever you wish. However, this can only be done by the child who has access to the card. By doing so, you teach your child to manage savings and expenses. Transfers between the account and the card are instant.
card_good_to_know_stolen_card_descriptio: PLZ_TRANSLATE If your child has lost their card or it has been stolen, you can block it in the app under settings. The card can be plocked temporarily if you wish to look for it, but we can also send out a new card free of charge.
card_good_to_know_passcode_description_p: PLZ_TRANSLATE When using Gimi Premium, real money is handled in the app, which means that we require extra security and a passcode. This can be changed under Settings.
card_good_to_know_subscription_descripti: PLZ_TRANSLATE Subscription fees, which can be paid monthly or yearly, are paid by saving your card details in the app. All information is encrypted and your card details are handled by the payment service provider, WorldPay. The subscription costs enable Gimi to continue to develop the app for you and your family so that children get even better at managing money and saving the world from future financial crises.
card_good_to_know_close_subscription_des: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you cancel your Gimi Premium subscription, your child‚Äôs card, Gimi account and app will be blocked. If you wish to continue using the app as a free user, your child will need to set up a new user account. Previous activity cannot be transferred to the new account. We will of course be sorry to see you go if you choose to leave us!
card_good_to_know_pay_online_description: PLZ_TRANSLATE To prevent others from using your card online, we will send out an SMS code to the contact number that is connected to your card to verify online purchases.
card_good_to_know_gimi_premium_title_par: PLZ_TRANSLATE A little about Gimi Premium
card_good_to_know_gimi_premium_descripti: PLZ_TRANSLATE When your child is ready to manage real money, you can upgrade your child to Gimi Premium. Your child will then get a Gimi account and a prepaid card from Mastercard. Everything will be managed in the app as before, but at the end of the month, real money will be transferred to your child‚Äôs new Gimi account. Your child can spend money with the card, but you will still have control and be able to see exactly how it is used from the app.
